means: 全心全意地，全神贯注地

entry.def: If you support or agree to something in a wholehearted way, you support or agree to it enthusiastically and completely.

example.ex: The Government deserves our wholehearted support for having taken a step in this direction.
example.tran: 政府已朝这个方向迈进了一步，理应得到我们的全力支持。

sentences.sentence: "he adopted wholeheartedly some of the policies that he had previously criticized"
